ImmediateDemands.title: Immediate Demands
ImmediateDemands.description: For the Australian government to comply with its International Law obligations by:

demands.description: Stopping the two-way arms trade with Israel.
Imposing a ban on Israeli soldiers travelling to Australia.
Investigating Australians who joined the IOF over the past 2 years.
Exerting diplomatic influence to: Stop the genocide and End the siege on Gaza.

LongTermDemands.title: Long Term Demands
LongTermDemands.description: For the Australian government to comply with its International Law obligations by:

demands.description: Ending Israeli occupation and colonisation of all Arab lands and dismantling the apartheid Wall
Recognizing the fundamental rights of the Arab-Palestinian citizens of Israel to full equality as citizens
Respecting, protecting and promoting the rights of Palestinian refugees to return to their homes and properties as stipulated in UN Resolution 194
